# Getting Started

## Setting up R packages

```{r}
packages = c('scales', 'viridis', 
             'lubridate', 'ggthemes', 
             'gridExtra', 'tidyverse', 
             'readxl', 'knitr',
             'data.table', 'ViSiElse')
for (p in packages){
  if(!require(p, character.only = T)){
    install.packages(p)
  }
  library(p,character.only = T)
}
```

## Importing Data

```{r}
attacks <- read_csv("data/eventlog.csv")
```
